casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Melissa Amber DALTON. No. 336PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 12, 2016. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Dalton, Melissa Amber. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

James R. Glover, Chapel Hill.

Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 12th of April 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of April 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 18th day of May 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
